{ "tiddlers": { "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/change.log": { "created": "20200510091859948", "text": "''v0.0.20'' - 2020-05-16 * Added support for simple Todo items by writing /todo command to the input box ''v0.0.18'' - 2020-05-13 * Added toolbar button for easy access (enable it from the control panel) * Minor but fixes ''v0.0.15'' - 2020-05-11 * Visual Tweaks * inline Edit of entries ''v0.0.11'' - 2020-05-11 * Recoded from scratch * Cleaner code * Delete Icon just shows on hover * Different Icons for expanded and non expanded entries * Cleaner Daily Note tiddler easier to manually edit ''v0.0.6'' - 2020-05-10 * Added a way to see older Daily Notes ''v0.0.4'' - 2020-05-10 * Initial Release", "tags": "", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/change.log", "modified": "20200516173546792" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture": { "created": "20200509164956768", "text": "\define get-origEntry() $(entryTime)$~$(entryAction)$$(entryData)$
\define get-edittedEntry() $(trimmedEdittedEntry)$
\define get-TodoIndex() $(today)$~$(entryTime)$$(entryData)$ \define get-TodoAdd() /todo $(add)$ \define listNotTodo()
<>
\end \define show-deleteButton() <$button class=<> tooltip="Delete Entry" set={{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection}} setTo={{{ [splitjoin[]] }}} > {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} \end \define start-entryEdit() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/DN-editEntry/$(entryData)$" text="$(entryTime)$~$(entryAction)$$(entryData)$" /> \end \define end-entryEdit() <$set name=edittedEntry tiddler="$:/temp/DN-editEntry/$(entryData)$"> <$set name="trimmedEdittedEntry" value={{{ [trim[]] }}} > <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection}} $field="text" $value={{{ [splitjoin] }}} /> \end \define show-editButton() <$vars state=<> > <$checkbox tiddler=<> field="text" checked="edit" unchecked="" uncheckactions=<> checkactions=<> class="DN-check-edit">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="edit">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/DN-editEntry/$(entryData)$" field="text" class="tc-edit-texteditor" tag=input />
\end \define DN_ifTiddlerNotExists() <$button class=<> tooltip="Expand Entry" > {{$:/core/images/clone-button}} <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> text="""[[$(today)$]] @ $(entryTime)$""" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<> /> <> <> <> <>
\end \define DN_ifTiddlerExists() <$list filter="[title] +[has[title]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$button class=<> tooltip="Zoom to Entry" > {{$:/core/images/link}} <$action-navigate $to=<> /> <> <> <> <>
\end \define show-entryData() <$list filter="[!is[blank]]" > <$checkbox tiddler="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/todoStatus" index=<> checked="checked" unchecked="" default=""> <> <$list filter="[is[blank]]" > <> \end \define get-updatedText() $(currentContent)$''$(timestamp)$''~$(add)$
\define entry-notTodo() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> <$fieldmangler tiddler=<> > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="DailyNotes" /> <$action-deletefield $tiddler="$:/temp/Append" newEntry /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection" text=<> /> \end <$set name=today value=<> >

<> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Manually edit Today's notes">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<> />

<$keyboard key="enter"> <$edit-text class="dn-input input-large" tiddler="$:/temp/Append" field="newEntry" placeholder="Free your mind, dump it here..." focus="true"/> <$set name="timestamp" value=<> > <$set name=currentContent tiddler=<> > <$set name="add" value={{{ [{$:/temp/Append!!newEntry}trim[]] }}} > <$list filter="[regexp[/todo(?i)]]" variable=result emptyMessage=<> > <$vars add = {{{ [split[/todo]trim[]join[ ]trim[]] }}}> <$vars add=<> > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> <$fieldmangler tiddler=<> > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="DailyNotes" /> <$action-deletefield $tiddler="$:/temp/Append" newEntry /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection" text=<> />

Entries of the: <$select tiddler="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection" default="" > <$list filter='[all[]tag[DailyNotes]!sort[title]]' >

<$set name=currentContent tiddler=<> > <$set name=Content tiddler={{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection}} emptyValue="" > <$list filter="[split[
]!is[blank]]" variable="entry"> <$vars entryTime={{{ [split[~]first[]trim[]] }}} entryData={{{ [split[~]butfirst[]trim[]] }}} > <$list filter="[regexp[/todo(?i)]]" variable=result emptyMessage=<> > <$vars entryData = {{{ [split[/todo]trim[]join[]trim[]] }}} entryAction="/todo ">
<>
", "bag": "default", "revision": "25", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture", "tags": "", "modified": "20200516172448448", "caption": "Daily Notes" }, "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/DailyNotes": { "created": "20200509171443220", "text": "Calls the Daily Notes Tiddler", "tags": "", "title": "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/DailyNotes", "modified": "20200509171522039" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/readme": { "created": "20200510092225619", "text": "[[Daily Notes|https://github.com/akhater/Daily-Notes-for-TW5]] brings interstitial journaling to TiddlyWiki ''Usage'' * Keyboard shortcut Alt+Q by default * Create a tiddler and put the below in it to show the interface without shortcut (e.g. for mobile use) ** `` {{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture}} `` ", "tags": "", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/readme", "modified": "20200510092554773", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "revision": "48", "bag": "default" }, "$:/config/shortcuts/DailyNotes": { "created": "20200509171534672", "text": "alt+q", "tags": "", "title": "$:/config/shortcuts/DailyNotes", "modified": "20200509171556646" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/KBshortcut": { "created": "20200509171745928", "text": "<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList"> <$action-navigate $to="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture"/> ", "tags": "$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/KBshortcut", "modified": "20200510091739105", "key": "((DailyNotes))" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/stylesheet": { "created": "20200509183459884", "text": "input.dn-input.input-large { width: 100%; padding: .5em 1em; font-size: 1.1em; } .dn-label { display: block; text-align: right; font-size: .8em; opacity: .6; } input.dn-input:focus { border-color: rgb(255, 201, 102); } .DN-entries .DN-deleteButton { opacity: 0; } .DN-entries:hover .DN-deleteButton { opacity: 1; fill: grey; } .DN-entries:hover .DN-deleteButton:hover { fill: #c70000 ; } .DN-entries .DN-editButton { opacity: 0; } .DN-entries:hover .DN-editButton { opacity: 1; } .DN-editButton:hover { fill: #228c22 ; } .DN-check-edit input{display:none;} .DN-check-edit svg{fill:grey;height:1em;width:1em;curser:pointer;} .DN-check-edit:hover svg{ fill:green; }", "bag": "default", "revision": "32", "type": "text/css", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/stylesheet", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "modified": "20200511165058276" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/buttons/open-DailyNotes": { "text": "\whitespace trim \define control-panel-button(class) <$button to="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture" tooltip="Open Daily Notes" aria-label="Open Daily Notes" class="""$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $class$"""> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/images/journal-icon}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="Open Daily Notes"/> \end <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title[$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture]]" emptyMessage=<>> <> ", "bag": "default", "revision": "7", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/buttons/open-DailyNotes", "tags": "$:/tags/PageControls", "modified": "20200513065825393", "description": "Opens Daily Notes", "created": "20200512053105188", "caption": "{{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/images/journal-icon}} Daily Notes" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/images/journal-icon": { "text": "", "bag": "default", "revision": "5", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/images/journal-icon", "tags": "", "modified": "20200513070135038", "created": "20200511213348318" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection": { "created": "20200513073752237", "text": "2020-05-16", "bag": "default", "revision": "44", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection", "modified": "20200516173159175" } } }
title: $:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes
name: DailyNotes
